import React,{useState}from'react';import{Route,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import Header from'./components/Header';import BigImage from'./components/BigImage';import About from'./components/About';import Menu from'./components/Menu';import CartSidebar from'./components/CartSidebar';import Team from'./components/Team';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){// State để quản lý giỏ hàng
const[cartItems,setCartItems]=useState([]);// Hàm thêm vào giỏ hàng
const addToCart=(name,price,image)=>{const newItem={name,price,image};setCartItems([...cartItems,newItem]);};// Hàm xóa món khỏi giỏ hàng
const removeFromCart=index=>{const updatedCart=cartItems.filter((_,i)=>i!==index);setCartItems(updatedCart);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Routes,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BigImage,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(About,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{addToCart:addToCart}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartSidebar,{cartItems:cartItems,removeFromCart:removeFromCart}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Team,{})]})})});}export default App;
